label: Gender
desc: Patient's Gender Male as 1 Female as 0 (Nominal)

label: Chest Pain
desc: Type of chest pain categorized into 1 typical, 2 typical angina, 3 non-anginal pain, 4 asymptomatic (Categorical)

label: Resting BP
desc: Level of blood pressure at resting mode in mm/HG (Numerical)

label: Fasting BS
desc: Blood sugar levels on fasting > 120 mg/dl represents as 1 in case of true and 0 as false

label: ECG
desc: result of electrocardiogram while at rest are represented in 3 distinct values 0 : Normal 1: Abnormality in ST-T wave 2: Left ventricular hypertrophy

label: Angina
desc: Angina induced by exercise 0 depicting NO 1 depicting Yes (Nominal)

label: ST Depression
desc: Exercise induced ST-depression in comparison with the state of rest (Numeric)

label: ST Slope
desc: ST segment measured in terms of slope during peak exercise 0: Normal 1: Upsloping 2: Flat 3: Downsloping

label: Heart Risk
desc: Heart Risk 1 means heart disease 0 means normal
